Class KeyWatcher

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      objectdraw.ActiveObject
          KeyWatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class KeyWatcher
extends objectdraw.ActiveObject
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener

A threaded process to watch for keystrokes controlling one specific tank.

Author:
Seth Battis
